trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around July 25th 2007
Summary: a star just like any other star in the night sky moving,then reversed direction same flight path at high rate of speed until it was gone.
divs: Sighting Details I put some trash out in the back of my house at 9:54 pm. The sky line is open & that night it was clear with a full moon just days away. For me looking up into the night sky to see stars, planes etc. is a normal and almost daily routine. I noticed a small plane( not to high ) flying towards ,what I call the " 3 point star triangle". I looked away but knew that something caught my eye. When I looked back up at the plane,that's when I saw it. I was watching this star ( no other way to describe it )moving in almost the same direction of the plane,and for the life of me...,I could not take my eyes off of it. The first thing I was thinking, could it be a jet flying 35,000 ft,but that wasn't it. I looked away for 5 seconds after watching it for 2 minutes. When I looked back up,I was expecting to see it flying towards that 3 point star triangle but didn't see it. I then looked at the same path that it was traveling and went backwards. That's when I knew this wasn't a star. The object had reversed its direction on the same flight path but at an unbelievable speed. Within a matter of seconds it was gone into the clear open sky as if it just disappeared. To me,words cannot explain what I witnessed you just had to be there. Thank You & Keep Your Eyes On The Sky !!!
